languages.text: "{name}, ваши серфы обучены грамоте? Я могла бы одолжить им очень познавательную брошюру по этикету!" {n}Кассия бросает взгляд на запачканные руки девушек и морщится.{/n} "Впрочем, наверное, они просто используют ее для растопки..."

"{name}, are your serfs literate? I could lend them a highly informative pamphlet on etiquette!" {n}Cassia glances at Nemi and Mia's grubby hands and wrinkles her nose.{/n} "Then again, they would probably just burn it for warmth..."
languages.original_text: "{name}, ваши серфы обучены грамоте? Я могла бы одолжить им очень познавательную брошюру по этикету!" {n}Кассия бросает взгляд на запачканные руки девушек и морщится.{/n} "Впрочем, наверное, они просто используют ее для растопки..."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, are your serfs literate? I could lend them a highly informative pamphlet on etiquette!" {n}Cassia glances at the girls' grubby hands and wrinkles her nose.{/n} "Then again, they would probably just burn it for warmth..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «{name}, ¿sus siervos saben leer? ¡Podría pasarles un folleto con información muy útil sobre la cortesía!». {n}Cassia echa un vistazo a las manos sucias de Nemi y Mia y arruga la nariz.{/n} «Aunque seguramente lo quemarían para calentarse...».
languages.original_text: "{name}, are your serfs literate? I could lend them a highly informative pamphlet on etiquette!" {n}Cassia glances at Nemi and Mia's grubby hands and wrinkles her nose.{/n} "Then again, they would probably just burn it for warmth..."

traits.locale_text: «{name}, ¿sus siervos saben leer? ¡Podría pasarles un folleto con información muy útil sobre la cortesía!». {n}Cassia echa un vistazo a las manos sucias de Nemi y Mia y arruga la nariz.{/n} «Aunque seguramente lo quemarían para calentarse...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}、あなたの農奴は読み書きができますか？礼儀作法に関する非常に有益なパンフレットをお貸しすることができます！」{n}カシアはネミとミアの不潔な手に目をやり、鼻にしわを寄せた。{/n}「そしてまた、彼らは暖を取るために燃やすだろう…」
languages.original_text: "{name}, are your serfs literate? I could lend them a highly informative pamphlet on etiquette!" {n}Cassia glances at Nemi and Mia's grubby hands and wrinkles her nose.{/n} "Then again, they would probably just burn it for warmth..."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、あなたの農奴は読み書きができますか？礼儀作法に関する非常に有益なパンフレットをお貸しすることができます！」{n}カシアはネミとミアの不潔な手に目をやり、鼻にしわを寄せた。{/n}「そしてまた、彼らは暖を取るために燃やすだろう…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，这些仆役识字吗？我可以把这本专门介绍贵族礼仪的手册借给她们！”{n}卡西娅瞟了一眼涅米和米娅的脏手，皱起了鼻子。{/n}“但转念一想，她们说不定会把书烧了取暖……”
languages.original_text: "{name}, are your serfs literate? I could lend them a highly informative pamphlet on etiquette!" {n}Cassia glances at Nemi and Mia's grubby hands and wrinkles her nose.{/n} "Then again, they would probably just burn it for warmth..."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，这些仆役识字吗？我可以把这本专门介绍贵族礼仪的手册借给她们！”{n}卡西娅瞟了一眼涅米和米娅的脏手，皱起了鼻子。{/n}“但转念一想，她们说不定会把书烧了取暖……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, können Eure Diener lesen und schreiben? Ich könnte ihnen ein ausgesprochen informatives Schreiben hinsichtlich der Etikette überlassen." {n}Cassia wirft Nemi und Mias schmutzigen Händen einen Blick zu und rümpft die Nase.{/n} "Andererseits würden sie es vermutlich nur anzünden, um sich zu wärmen ..."
languages.original_text: "{name}, are your serfs literate? I could lend them a highly informative pamphlet on etiquette!" {n}Cassia glances at Nemi and Mia's grubby hands and wrinkles her nose.{/n} "Then again, they would probably just burn it for warmth..."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, können Eure Diener lesen und schreiben? Ich könnte ihnen ein ausgesprochen informatives Schreiben hinsichtlich der Etikette überlassen." {n}Cassia wirft Nemi und Mias schmutzigen Händen einen Blick zu und rümpft die Nase.{/n} "Andererseits würden sie es vermutlich nur anzünden, um sich zu wärmen ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {name}, vos serfs savent-ils lire ? Je me ferai un plaisir de leur transmettre une brochure très instructive sur le savoir-vivre ! » {n}Cassia retrousse le nez à la vue des mains crasseuses de Nemi et Mia.{/n} « Bien qu'ils se contenteraient sûrement de la brûler pour se réchauffer… »
languages.original_text: "{name}, are your serfs literate? I could lend them a highly informative pamphlet on etiquette!" {n}Cassia glances at Nemi and Mia's grubby hands and wrinkles her nose.{/n} "Then again, they would probably just burn it for warmth..."

traits.locale_text: « {name}, vos serfs savent-ils lire ? Je me ferai un plaisir de leur transmettre une brochure très instructive sur le savoir-vivre ! » {n}Cassia retrousse le nez à la vue des mains crasseuses de Nemi et Mia.{/n} « Bien qu'ils se contenteraient sûrement de la brûler pour se réchauffer… »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, kölelerin okuma yazma biliyor mu? Onlara görgü kurallarına dair son derece bilgilendirici bir kitapçık verebilirim!" {n}Cassia, Nemi'ye ve Mia'nın kir içindeki elleriyle burnundaki kırışıklara bakıyor.{/n} "Gerçi muhtemelen ısınmak için onları yakarlar..."
languages.original_text: "{name}, are your serfs literate? I could lend them a highly informative pamphlet on etiquette!" {n}Cassia glances at Nemi and Mia's grubby hands and wrinkles her nose.{/n} "Then again, they would probably just burn it for warmth..."
